::CyberShark/Eclipse::

    He got Battera's comm and was happy, maybe now =
she was willing to leave the Alliance. And if he could get her out then he =
could carry out his plans privately, without worry for her. He raced down t=
he hall and out the door. He stopped in front of Zardus.
    "I'm going to =
get Battera," He said while firing at the attackers (If they are still ther=
e if not then he stares into Zardus's optics) "I'll convince her."
    He l=
eft without telling Zardus what he really ment. As soon as he was out of sc=
anner and optical range he cloaked. He then transformed to flight mode and =
went off after her signal. It kept blinking in his Optics, but he could hol=
d it for the most part. Soon he saw Vulois chasing after her. He caught up =
to him and saw the evil look in his eyes. (remember still cloaked.) Then he=
 spoke, it would seem as if it were coming from everywhere.
    "The leader=
 of Peace so angry? Why is this?"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: l=
ogomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 1=
2, 2000 2:55 PM
  Subject: Battera is enraged.


  (If one more of my char'=
s get's called a bitch, I'm blowing up the 
  planet. Got it? Good. Get cre=
ative, but knock off the cussing.  I 
  mean, my chars don't go calling the=
 other chars names like that. 
  Battera called Vulois a creep.  KitKat ref=
ered to Megatron as a 
  jerk.  Come on.  Get creative please. Thank you.)
=

  ::Battera::
  She flew high and went into a cloud bank. "That inferior p=
iece of 
  Cybertrash.  He just hauled of and hit me for no reason. Huh, I =

  should have let him stayed tied up."  She landed a few miles away 
  fro=
m the allience base, just at the boarder of thier scanners.  She 
  landed =
in a tree and rubbed the side of her face.  It stung and 
  burned slightly=
. "He's so high and mighty,he's such a creep. Just hit 
  a bot for no reas=
on. And that ladyhawk feather head,royalty huh? They 
  can all go to the p=
it. I'm tired of being pushed around. So I'm not 
  royalty. So I'm not som=
e special big hot shot from the outer limits 
  or something."  SHe turned =
her head back towards the direction of the 
  alliance base and stuck her t=
ongue out. "FFFBBBBRRRTTT. To the 
  darkest corner of the pit with you. Wh=
o needs you anyway. I don't." 
  she lightly touches the mark on the side o=
f her face. "I'll make sure 
  I repay you for this."  She sat in the tree.=
 Not realizing she was 
  still in the scanner range, she hung upside down =
in the high branches 
  of the tree.  Her wings wrapped around her and trie=
d to conseal 
  herself in the shadow.  "Yeah, who needs them anyway." She =
kept an 
  eye out for passing bots, but would remain quiet. She was too ma=
d to 
  think correctly and decided to try to calm down before doing anythi=
ng 
  else. 


        eGroups Sponsor
